Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 17
Notes: The last image of the series shows the signing of the Agreement in Nanjing on 3 July 1948, with the US Ambassador, John Leighton Stuart (standing in the middle in a gray suit), and the ROC Minister of Foreign Affairs, Wang Shijie (Wang Shih-chieh, 王世杰, holding the pen/brush). The other two are the Chinese Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs and the representative of the American Relief Agency. The text quotes remarks made by the two representatives during the signing.Nr. 17 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
